sentences.en: All parts are machined from top grade, high tensile aluminium.
sentences.cn: 所有零件都是用顶级高强度铝加工而成。

sentences.en: Alternatively, a reflective type of adhesive containing aluminium powder may be used.
sentences.cn: 此外, 也可采用含有铝粉的反射型粘接剂.

sentences.en: Aluminium is a kind of metal.
Aluminium is rapidly oxidized in air.
sentences.cn: 铝会在空气中迅速氧化。

sentences.en: Aluminium looks heavy but actually it is very light.
sentences.cn: 铝看起来很重,实际上却很轻.

sentences.en: An aluminium mirror, applied using a vacuum coating process.
sentences.cn: 利用真空涂层工序涂上的铝质镜面.

sentences.en: As the raw material of aluminium production, aluminium oxide is also lacking.
sentences.cn: 氧化铝作为铝锭生产的主要原料, 其需求量也居高不下.

sentences.en: Don't leave the aluminium spoon in the saltcellar. It will be eaten into by salt.
sentences.cn: 别把铝勺留在盐罐中,因为盐腐蚀铝.

sentences.en: If necessary, we can use aluminium instead of steel.
sentences.cn: 如果必要, 我们可用铝代钢.

sentences.en: The aluminium alloy forgings were used for varieties of industrial departments.
sentences.cn: 铝合金模锻件被广泛应用于各个工业部门.

sentences.en: The building is impeccably modernist: glass, aluminium and grey.
sentences.cn: 这座楼完全是现代主义风格：采用玻璃和铝质材料，以灰色作为基调。

sentences.en: The greenhouses come equipped with a ventilating system and aluminium screen door.
sentences.cn: 那些温室送来时配有通风系统和铝制纱门。

sentences.en: The temper of steel is higher than that of aluminium.
These aluminium kettles have been marked down ten percent because of minor flaws.
sentences.cn: 这些铝壶因为有些小毛病而减价百分之十.

sentences.en: We employ aluminium for our cooking pots.

phrases.tran_cn: 铝箔（作包装材料）；锡箔纸

trans.tran_en: a silver-white metal that is very light and is used to make cans, cooking pans, window frames etc. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Al
